original_text: Lo, this only have I found, that God hath made man upright; but they have sought out many inventions.
korean_text: 내가 깨달은 것은 오직 이것이라 곧 하나님은 사람을 정직하게 지으셨으나 사람이 많은 꾀들을 낸 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Lo, this only have I found
that God hath made man upright
but they have sought out many inventions
